chikaalice: So I finally summoned the courage to write barely three months ago, and for such a young "writer", have managed to surprise even myself ever since. Imagine writing something for the very first time and getting published. Yep, that's me! So how about you give the link in my bio the big tap, read up my first short story, and let me know what you think - constructive criticism, so to speak chikaalice07@gmail.com
